rule: Surge: Score this immediately after your Leader makes a successful Attack action as part of a Charge action.

name: Loaded with Plunder
rule: Score this in an end phase if one or more friendly fighters have three or more upgrades.

name: Marking Your Territory
rule: Score this in an end phase if your warband holds one or more objectives in enemy territory.

name: No Mercy
rule: Surge: Score this immediately after a friendly fighter's successful Attack action that targeted an enemy fighter with one or more wound tokens.

name: Plunderers
rule: Score this in an end phase if each surviving friendly fighter has one or more upgrades.

name: Swift Hunters
rule: Score this in an end phase if three or more surviving friendly fighters each have one or more Move and/or Charge tokens.

name: Defensive Manoeuvre
rule: Choose one friendly fighter. Push that fighter up to 1 hex away from the nearest enemy fighter. Give the friendly fighter one Guard token.

name: Furious Reprisal
rule: Reaction: Play this after an enemy fighter's Attack action that targeted a friendly fighter. That friendly fighter makes an Attack action that must target that enemy fighter, and you can re-roll any number of dice in the attack roll.

name: Hamstring
rule: Reaction: Play this after a friendly fighter's successful Snarlfang's Jaws Attack action. Give the target of that Attack action one Move token.

name: Narrow Escape
rule: Reaction: Play this when a friendly fighter is dealt damage, before placing wound tokens on their fighter card. Reduce that damage by 1, to a minimum of 1.

name: Pack Tactics
rule: Choose one friendly fighter and up to two friendly fighters adjacent to that fighter. Push each chosen fighter 1 hex.

name: Savage Mauling
rule: The first Range 1 or Range 2 Attack action made by a friendly fighter in the next activation has +1 Dice and +1 Damage for each supporting friendly fighter.

name: Smell Weakness
rule: The first Attack action made by a friendly fighter in the next activation has Cleave and Ensnare if the target has one or more wound tokens.

name: Unbridled Ferocity
rule: Reaction: Play this after a friendly fighter's failed Snarlfang's Jaws Attack action. That fighter makes a Snarlfang's Jaws Attack action.

name: Venomous Spittle
rule: Reaction: Play this after a friendly fighter's successful Snarlfang's Jaws Attack action. The target of that Attack action is dealt 1 damage at the end of each action phase. This effect persists until the target is out of action.

name: Vindictive Attack
rule: +2 Dice to the first Attack action made by a friendly fighter in the next activation.

name: Bonded
rule: When this fighter makes an Attack action that targets an adjacent enemy fighter, or is the target of an Attack action made by an adjacent enemy fighter, this fighter is considered to have one additional supporting fighter.

name: Boss Hat
rule:
If your leader is out of action:
+1 Defence
+1 Damage to this fighter's Range 1 and Range 2 Attack actions.

name: Circling Hunter
rule: Reaction: After this fighter's Attack action (but not during a superaction) or after an Attack action that targets this fighter (but not during a superaction), push this fighter 1 hex.

name: Embittered Survivor
rule: +1 Wounds.

name: Fiendish Jab
rule: +1 Damage to this fighter's Stabbin' Stikka Attack action for each Critical success in the attack roll.

name: Hidden Slitta
rule:
1 Fury 3 1
Cleave

name: Hunt as One
rule: When this fighter supports a friendly fighter, this fighter is considered to be two supporting fighters.

name: Loping Strides
rule: +2 Move.

name: Pack Leader
rule: You can re-roll any number of dice in this fighter's attack rolls for the Snarlfang's Jaws Attack action.

name: Quickdrop Venom
rule: Reaction: After this fighter's successful Attack action (other than a Snarlfang's Jaws Attack action), roll one attack dice. On a Smash or Critical success the target of that Attack action is dealt 1 damage.

name: Annihilation
rule: Score this in an end phase if all enemy fighters are out of action.

name: Beyond Mortal
rule:
Hybrid: Score this in an end phase
If: A friendly fighter has 4 or more wound tokens
Or: A surviving friendly fighter has a Move and/or Wounds characteristic or 8 or more.

name: Brought to Bay
rule:
Surge, Dual: Score this immediately
If: A friendly Hunter makes an Attack action that takes an enemy fighter out of action
And: That enemy fighter was in enemy territory.

name: Committed
rule:
Hybrid: Score this in an end phase
If: Each surviving friendly fighter is adjacent to one or more enemy fighters
Or: One or more friendly fighters are each adjacent to three or more enemy fighters.

name: Conquest
rule: Score this in the third end phase if all surviving friendly fighters are in your opponent's territory.

name: Coveted Spoils
rule: Score this in an end phase if all objectives are held.

name: Denial
rule: Score this in the third end phase if there are no enemy fighters in your territory.

name: Duck and Parry
rule: Surge: Score this immediately after an Attack action that targets a friendly fighter with one or more Guard tokens fails.

name: Dug In
rule:
Dual: Score this in an end phase
If: Your warband holds three or more objectives
And: Your warband held three or more objectives are the start of the round.

name: Fateful Strike
rule: Surge: Score this immediately after a friendly fighter's successful Attack action that targets a fighter with a Defence characteristic of 2 or more.

name: Gathered Momentum
rule:
Surge, Hybrid: Score this immediately
If: You score your second or subsequent surge objective card in a phase
Or: A friendly fighter makes a Charge action and ends that action five or more hexes from the hex in which they began the action.

name: Hold Objective 1
rule: Score this in an end phase if your warband holds objective 1.

name: Hold Objective 2
rule: Score this in an end phase if your warband holds objective 2.

name: Hold Objective 3
rule: Score this in an end phase if your warband holds objective 3.

name: Hold Objective 4
rule: Score this in an end phase if your warband holds objective 4.

name: Hold Objective 5
rule: Score this in an end phase if your warband holds objective 5.

name: Path to Victory
rule:
Dual: Score this in an end phase
If: One or more enemy fighters were taken out of action in the previous phase
And: Your warband holds two or more objectives.

name: Run Ragged
rule: Score this in an end phase if each surviving fighter has one or more Move and/or Charge tokens.

name: Scrum
rule: Surge: Score this immediately after an activation if four or more fighters on the battlefield are in a single group in which each fighter is adjacent to at least one other fighter in that group.

name: Steady Assault
rule: Surge: Score this immediately after the same friendly fighter's third or subsequent Attack action in a single phase.

name: Supremacy
rule: Score this in an end phase if your warband holds three or more objectives.

name: Swift Capture
rule:
Surge, Dual: Score this immediately after an activation
If: Your warband holds one or more objectives in friendly territory
And: Your warband holds one or more objectives in enemy territory.

name: Temporary Victory
rule: Surge: Score this immediately after an activation if your warband holds three or more objectives.

name: The Beast is Slain
rule: Surge: Score this immediately after a friendly Hunter's Attack action that takes an enemy leader or enemy Quarry out of action.

name: The Great Hunt
rule:
Hybrid: Score this in an end phase
If: One or more friendly Hunters each have three or more upgrades
Or: Three or more friendly Hunters each have one or more upgrades.

name: To the End
rule: Score this in an end phase if there are no cards left in your power deck.

name: Veteran Survivors
rule: Score this in the third end phase if there are three or more surviving friendly Hunters.

name: Cloaked in Shadow
rule: Choose a fighter. Until the end of the next activation, that fighter is a Quarry, players cannot choose that fighter when a gambit is played, and that fighter cannot be dealt damage by gambits.

name: Confusion
rule: Choose two fighters that are adjacent to each other. Place each fighter in the hex that was occupied by the other fighter when you chose them.

name: Dangerous Prize
rule: Pick one objective token in an empty hex. The first fighter to move into, be pushed into or be placed in the same hex as that objective token in the next activation is dealt 1 damage.

name: Desperate Flight
rule: Choose one friendly fighter and Scatter 4 from that fighter's hex. Push that fighter 3 hexes along the chain. If a hex that fighter would be pushed into is blocked or occupied, do not push that fighter any further.

name: Downwind
rule: Push one friendly Hunter 1 hex closer to an enemy fighter. That enemy fighter is a Quarry. This effect persists until that enemy fighter is taken out of action.

name: Eldritch Haze
rule: Gambit Spell (Focus): If cast, the caster has +1 Defence. This spell persists until the end of the round or until the caster is taken out of action.

name: Exhaustion
rule: Play this only in a power step following your activation. At the end of the next activation, choose one enemy fighter that made two or more actions in that activation. The chosen fighter is dealt 1 damage.

name: Fate's Decree
rule: Reaction: Play this after an opponent makes a roll as instructed by a gambit or upgrade (but not during an Attack action), before the effect of the roll is resolved. The opponent must re-roll that roll.

name: Frenzied Search
rule: Play this only if your warband holds one or more objectives. Discard one power card. If you do, draw up to three power cards.

name: Hostile Ground
rule: Choose one enemy fighter in your territory that is on or adjacent to one or more lethal hexes. That fighter is dealt 1 damage.

name: Hunting Band
rule: Choose one friendly Hunter and any number of adjacent friendly Hunters. Give each chosen fighter one Guard token.

name: Invert Terrain
rule: Gambit Spell (Focus): If cast, pick one feature token within five hexes of the caster. Flip that token.

name: Madness Dart
rule:
Poison
Choose one enemy fighter adjacent to one or more friendly fighters. The chosen fighter's Attack actions have the Fury characteristic instead of their printed characteristic. This effect persists until the chosen fighter is taken out of action.

name: Marked
rule: Choose a fighter. They are a Quarry. This persists until that fighter is taken out of action.

name: Mass Upheaval
rule: Gambit Spell (FocusFocus): If cast, roll one magic dice for each feature token in the same players territory as the caster. For each roll of Channel, flip that token. If the caster is in no one's territory, this spell fails.

name: Overkill
rule: Reaction: Play this after a friendly fighter's Attack action that took an enemy fighter out of action, if the Attack action dealt more damage than was necessary to take the target out of action. Gain 1 spent glory point.

name: Restless Prize
rule: Pick one objective token and move it into an adjacent hex up to two times. You cannot move it into a lethal hex or a hex that includes a feature token.

name: Sidestep
rule: Choose a friendly fighter and push them one hex.

name: Sitting Target
rule: The first Attack action made by a friendly fighter in the next activation has +1 Dice and Ensnare if the target has no Move or Charge tokens.

name: Snare
rule: Reaction: Play this during a friendly Hunter's Attack action, after it drives back an enemy fighter. The enemy fighter is dealt 1 damage.

name: Spinetoad Toxin
rule:
Poison
Choose one enemy fighter adjacent to one or more friendly fighters. The enemy fighter is dealt 1 damage after each Move action they make. This effect persists until the enemy fighter is out of action.

name: Tracking
rule: +1 Move to the first fighter to make a Move action in the next activation. +2 Move instead if that fighter is a Hunter.

name: Unexpected Peril
rule: Pick one feature token in an empty hex in your territory. Flip that token.

name: Amberbone Axe
rule:
3 Smash 2 1 After this fighter makes this Attack action, discard this card.
 1 Smash 2 2 If this Attack action takes an enemy fighter out of action, discard this card and gain 1 glory point.

name: Amberbone Hammer
rule:
1 Smash 2 2
Knockback 1 If this Attack action takes an enemy fighter out of action, discard this card and gain 1 glory point.

name: Avatar of the Ur-grub
rule:
This card cannot be included in your deck.
This card cannot be removed from this fighter.
This fighter is a Quarry.
This fighter's Range 1 and Range 2 Attack actions have +1 Damage and Ensnare.
Reaction: After this fighter's successful Range 1 or Range 2 Attack action, Heal (1) this fighter.

name: Bloodthief
rule: 1 Smash 2 2 Reaction: After this Attack action, if it succeeded, Heal (2) this fighter and discard this card.

name: Caltrops
rule: Reaction: During a Range 1 Attack action, after this fighter is driven back, but before they are dealt damage by any lethal hexes, their attacker is dealt 1 damage.

name: Great Fortitude
rule: +1 Wounds.

name: Great Speed
rule: +1 Move.

name: Great Strength
rule: +1 Damage to this fighter's Range 1 and Range 2 Attack actions.

name: Hidden Presence
rule: This fighter is a Quarry. If this fighter is a Quarry, players cannot choose this fighter when a gambit is played.

name: Hungry Realmstone
rule:
Reaction: After an activation, place one Potency counter on this card and lose one glory point.
+1 Damage to this fighter's Range 1 and Range 2 Attack actions for each Potency counter on this card.

name: Hunter's Reflexes
rule:
This fighter is a Hunter.
Reaction: Use this after an enemy fighter's activation, if that fighter is a Quarry. Push this fighter 1 hex closer to that enemy fighter.

name: Iara's Instant Shield
rule:
Lost Page
Spell action (Focus): Use this during an Attack action that targets this fighter, after the attack roll. If cast, you can re-roll any number of dice in the defence roll for that Attack action.

name: Inescapable Blow
rule: 1 Smash 2 2 Reaction: After this fighter's successful Attack action with Combo, make this Attack action. It must target the same fighter and has Cleave and Ensnare.

name: Larval Lance
rule: 2 Smash - - This Attack action's Dice and Damage characteristics are equal to the current round number (e.g. 1 in the first round). They cannot be modified.

name: Lethal Snares
rule: Reaction: After this fighter ends a push or a Move action in a hex that contains a feature token, or is placed in a hex that contains a feature token, flip that token.

name: Mazzig's Many Legs
rule:
Lost Page
Spell action (Channel): If cast, choose another friendly fighter within 2 hexes of the caster. Push the chosen fighter up to 2 hexes.

name: Opening Strike
rule:
1 Fury 3 1
Combo

name: Predatory Instinct
rule: This fighter is a Hunter. You can re-roll one dice in the attack rolls for this fighter's Attack actions that target a Quarry.

name: Repeating Mirror
rule: Reaction: After an enemy wizard casts a spell (other than a spell Attack action), and that spell is resolved, resolve that spell again with the same casting roll result, but do so as if this fighter was the caster and a wizard. Then discard this card.

name: Soothing Companion
rule: Reaction: After this fighter's activation, unless this fighter made one or more Attack actions in that activation, Heal (1) this fighter.

name: Sting of the Ur-Grub
rule:
Ur-grub Aspect
+1 Damage to this fighter's Range 1 Attack actions.
If this fighter has three or more Ur-grub Aspects, remove those cards from the game (they do not go into a discard pile) and give the Avatar of the Ur-grub upgrade to this fighter.

name: Stoneform
rule:
-1 Move (to a minimum of 0).
This fighter is a Quarry. If this fighter is a Quarry, this fighter cannot be pushed.

name: Survival Instincts
rule: This fighter is a Quarry. If this fighter is a Quarry, this fighter is on Guard.

name: Trophy Belt
rule: Gain 1 spent glory point when this fighter's Attack action takes an adjacent enemy fighter out of action. Gain 1 unspent glory point instead if the target was a Quarry.

name: Bold Conquest
rule:
Surge, Dual: Score this immediately after an activation
If: Your leader made a Charge action in that activation
And: your leader is holding an objective.

name: Concerted Attack
rule: Surge: Score this immediately after a third or subsequent friendly fighter makes an Attack action that targets the same enemy fighter in this phase.

name: Cover Ground
rule: Surge: Score this immediately after a friendly fighter makes a Move action in which they enter 6 or more hexes.

name: Finders of the Way
rule:
Dual: Score this in an end phase
If: There are three or more surviving friendly fighters
And: Each surviving friendly fighter has one or more Cursed Key upgrades.

name: Guardians of the Way
rule:
Dual: Score this in an end phase
If: Your warband holds one or more objectives
And: No enemy warband holds any objectives.

name: Plant a Standard
rule: Score this in an end phase if your leader is holding an objective in enemy territory.

name: Steadfast Defender
rule: Surge: Score this immediately after an Attack action that targets a friendly fighter holding an objective, if that fighter is still holding that objective.

name: Tactical Genius 1-3
rule: Score this in an end phase if your warband holds objectives 1, 2 and 3.

name: Tactical Genius 3-5
rule: Score this in an end phase if your warband holds objectives 3, 4 and 5.

name: Tactical Supremacy 1-2
rule: Score this is an end phase if your warband holds objectives 1 and 2.

name: Tactical Supremacy 3-4
rule: Score this is an end phase if your warband holds objectives 3 and 4.

name: Victorious Duel
rule: Surge: Score this immediately when your leader's Attack action takes an enemy leader out of action.

name: Daylight Robbery
rule: Roll one attack dice. On a roll of Smash or Critical success take 1 unspent glory point from one opponent.

name: Distraction
rule: Choose one enemy fighter and push them 1 hex.

name: Forward Planning
rule: Choose one friendly fighter with no Charge tokens. Give that fighter one Charge token and one upgrade.

name: Harnessed Power
rule: Heal (1) each fighter that is holding an objective.

name: Jealous Defence
rule: Choose one friendly fighter with no Charge tokens holding an objective. The chosen fighter makes one Attack action.

name: Mischievous Spirits
rule: Starting with you and going clockwise, each player does the following: pick on objective that has not been moved with this ploy, and move that objective into an adjacent hex. Do this until each objective has been moved once.

name: Misdirection
rule: Reaction: Play this when a friendly fighter is chosen by a ploy. Choose another friendly fighter that could be chosen by that ploy. That fighter is chosen instead.

name: No Time
rule: Power cards cannot be played until after the next activation.

name: Rebound
rule: Reaction: Play this during an enemy fighter's Attack action, after the defence roll, if that Attack action would succeed. Roll one defence dice. On a roll of Dodge or Critical success the attacker is dealt damage equal to the Damage characteristic of the Attack action, and the combat sequence ends.

name: Spectral Wings
rule: +2 Move to the first fighter to make a Move action in the next activation.

name: Grim Tenacity
rule: This fighter cannot be driven back.

name: Guardian Glaive
rule: 2 Smash 2 2 If this fighter is holding an objective, you can re-roll any number of attack dice in the attack roll.

name: Lender's Lockbox
rule: Reaction: After this fighter is removed from the battlefield, pick one of their upgrades and return it to your hand.

name: Shardcaller
rule: At the beginning of each action phase, you can pick one objective held by this fighter and one other objective, then place each objective you picked in the hex that contained the other objective.

name: The Blazing Key
rule:
Cursed Key
If this fighter is holding objective 3 in the third end phase, gain 2 glory points.

name: The Dazzling Key
rule:
Cursed Key
If this fighter is holding objective 4 in the third end phase, gain 2 glory points.

name: The Formless Key
rule:
Cursed Key
If this fighter is holding an objective in the third end phase, gain 1 glory point.

name: The Fractured Key
rule:
Cursed Key
If this fighter is holding objective 5 in the third end phase, gain 2 glory points.

name: The Hallowed Key
rule:
Cursed Key
If this fighter is holding objective 1 in the third end phase, gain 2 glory points.

name: The Shadowed Key
rule:
Cursed Key
If this fighter is holding objective 2 in the third end phase, gain 2 glory points.
